articles.title: U.S. routs Czechs behind Amanda Kessel's hat trick to reach final of women's hockey worlds
articles.description: Amanda Kessel scored a hat trick and the United States kept alive its streak of reaching the final at every women's ice hockey world championship after beating the Czech Republic 10-1 in the semifinals on Saturday.

articles.title: Qatar World Cup: FIFA, tournament organisers agree to serve alcoholic beer at matches
articles.description: Organisers of the World Cup in Qatar have finalised a policy to serve beer with alcohol at stadiums and fan zones in the Muslim-majority country.
articles.content:

articles.author: Andrea AdelsonESPN Senior Writer
articles.title: Old Dominion does it again in second upset of Virginia Tech in four years
articles.description: Old Dominion took advantage of five turnovers by Virginia Tech and went on to a 20-17 win Friday that marked the Monarchs' second upset of the Hokies in four years.
articles.content:
For the second time in four years, Virginia Tech lost on the road to Old Dominion, falling Friday night 20-17.
Old Dominion fans stormed the field to celebrate their second win over a Power 5 team. … [+1851 chars]

articles.title: Serena Williams' dream run at US Open ends with third-round loss to Ajla Tomljanović
articles.description: Serena Williams staved off five match points in the third set but eventually fell to Ajla Tomljanovic in what could be the legend's final match.

articles.title: South Carolina, Dawn Staley cancel BYU women's basketball games over racial incident at volleyball game
articles.description: South Carolina and women's basketball coach Dawn Staley have canceled a home-and-home series with BYU over a recent incident where a Duke volleyball player said a Cougars fan yelled racial slurs at her.

articles.title: College Football Playoff to expand to 12-team format
articles.description: The College Football Playoff's board of managers voted Friday to expand the CFP to 12 teams in 2026, but it is encouraging the sport's commissioners to try to implement it as soon as 2024.
